backend/main.mo: Main actor for the trading journal backend, defining Trade and UserProfile types, per-user data storage, and shared/query functions for managing trades, account settings, risk parameters, and user profiles with access control.
backend/migration.mo: Data migration module that upgrades stored actor state by adding a default `convictionLevel = 3` field to all existing trades for each user.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented feature IDs (glassmorphism styling, neon Buy/Sell buttons, sidebar icons, P&L chart, etc.) to the frontend files and components that satisfy each requirement.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary of one-line summaries for each frontend source file, describing the purpose of every page, component, hook, and config file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell that mounts the React app into a `#root` div and loads the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with all page routes, React Query client, dark ThemeProvider, and a global Toaster notification component.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App shell component rendering a glassmorphism sidebar with 22px lucide-react nav icons, active state indicators, user profile display, logout button, and a mobile overlay toggle.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Renders the login page for the Operator Trading Journal app, displaying branding, feature highlights, and an Internet Identity login button with loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts a newly authenticated user to enter their trader name and saves it via the useSaveCallerUserProfile hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated (or anonymous) ICP backend actor using TanStack Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: React hook that fetches the current authenticated user's profile from the backend actor using TanStack Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flows, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of TanStack Query hooks for all backend data operations including trades (CRUD), account size, daily max loss, and backup functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveCallerUserProf: Mutation hook that saves the caller's user profile to the backend actor and invalidates the cached profile query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining CSS custom properties for the dark trading-themed design system (colors, radius, profit/loss tokens) and reusable component classes like glassmorphism cards and neon buy/sell buttons.
frontend/src/lib/tradeUtils.ts: Utility functions for trade calculations (PnL, risk, R:R ratio), formatting (currency, numbers, dates), and aggregation helpers including overall stats, monthly breakdowns, and CSV export.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Analytics dashboard page that visualizes trade data through monthly P&L bar charts, emotion analysis, buy/sell direction pie charts, and mistake frequency charts using Recharts.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying summary stat cards and a 7-day P&L area chart built with Recharts, pulling trade data via the useGetTrades hook.
frontend/src/pages/NewTradePage.tsx: Form page for logging a new trade, featuring a live risk calculator, conviction star meter, and dropdown selectors for emotion, setup type, and mistake options.
frontend/src/pages/RiskManagementPage.ts: Risk management page for configuring account size and daily max loss limits, displaying live P&L status with over-limit alerts, and handling JSON backup export/import.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Simple static settings page showing app version/about info and a note about the fixed dark theme.
frontend/src/pages/TradeLogPage.tsx: A React page that displays a filterable, searchable trade log table with options to delete trades, showing details like stock name, direction, P&L, conviction stars, and mistakes. Includes filter controls for direction, trade type, strategy, and mistake type.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to extract URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, persist them in sessionStorage, and clean sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts (Inter, Space Grotesk), CSS-variable-based color tokens, glassmorphism/neon box shadows, and accordion/glow animations, plus typography and container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file describing the dark-themed Trading Journal app's architecture, existing features (glassmorphism, neon buttons, P&L chart, risk-reward calculator, etc.), known issues, and versioning information.
